text.value:
DECLARE @BatchSize INT = 10000; -- Define the batch size
DECLARE @RowsAffected INT = 1;   -- Initialize with a non-zero value
DECLARE @TotalRowsDeleted INT = 0; -- Track total deleted rows
DECLARE @ArchiveDays INT = 30;    -- Number of days for archiving

WHILE @RowsAffected > 0
BEGIN
    BEGIN TRANSACTION;

   DELETE TOP (@BatchSize) 
    FROM [dbo].[BrowserTabLogs_Archive_Duplicate]
where cast(createddate as date)='2024-08-12'

    SET @RowsAffected = @@ROWCOUNT; -- Get the number of rows deleted in the last batch
    SET @TotalRowsDeleted = @TotalRowsDeleted + @RowsAffected; -- Update total deleted count

    COMMIT TRANSACTION;
END

-- Return the total number of deleted rows
SELECT @TotalRowsDeleted AS TotalRowsDeleted;
